name: Chicken and Spinach Puffs
author: candace
summary: These puffs are stuffed with a delicious creamy chicken mixture and baked.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed
3 (10 ounce) cans refrigerated crescent roll dough
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Cook and stir chicken, onion, and garlic in a large skillet over medium-low heat until onion is tender, about 5 minutes
Cook, stirring often, until spinach is reduced and chicken is lightly browned, about 10 more minutes
Transfer mixture to a bowl and combine with ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and butter; mix until filling is creamy
Unroll crescent roll dough and pinch 2 triangles together to form a rectangle of dough; repeat with remaining dough to make 12 rectangles
Place about 1 tablespoon of chicken filling onto the center of each rectangle and fold the corners together to make balls
Arrange balls on a large baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until filling is heated through and puffs are golden brown, about 12 minutes
